sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均有"打开"之意。
means: unfold ： 主要指把原来包好、卷好或叠好的东西再打开。
open ： 普通用词，指把原来关起来或盖紧的东西打开。

entry.def: If a situation unfolds, it develops and becomes known or understood.

example.ex: The outcome depends on conditions as well as how events unfold...
example.tran: 结果取决于条件，还取决于事件的进展。

example.ex: The facts started to unfold before them.
example.tran: 真相开始在他们面前显露出来。

entry.def: If a story unfolds or if someone unfolds it, it is told to someone else.

example.ex: Don's story unfolded as the cruise got under way...
example.tran: 随着航行的开始，唐的故事也随之展开。

example.ex: Mr Wills unfolds his story with evident enjoyment.
example.tran: 威尔斯先生喜形于色地讲述自己的经历。

entry.def: If someone unfolds something which has been folded or if it unfolds, it is opened out and becomes flat.

example.ex: He quickly unfolded the blankets and spread them on the mattress...
example.tran: 他迅速展开毯子，铺在床垫上。

example.ex: When the bird lifts off into flight, its wings unfold to an impressive six-foot span.
example.tran: 这种鸟起飞时，翼展可达6英尺，很惊人。

means.word_mean: 1. develop or come to a promising stage;

sentences.sentence: "A walk through town will unfold many interesting buildings"

means.word_mean: 3. extend or stretch out to a greater or the full length;
4. spread out or open from a closed or folded state;

auth_sentence.content: Where in the brain do such belief processes unfold?
auth_sentence.res_content: Where in the brain do such belief processes unfold?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Where in the brain do such belief processes unfold?

auth_sentence.content: Motorists would just unfold the wings and off they go.
auth_sentence.res_content: Motorists would just unfold the wings and off they go.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Motorists would just unfold the wings and off they go.

auth_sentence.content: The larger forces of global capitalism will continue to unfold.
auth_sentence.res_content: The larger forces of global capitalism will continue to unfold.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The larger forces of global capitalism will continue to unfold.

means.word_mean: 显露, 展现, 展示, 透露

sentences.en: As I opened the scroll, a panorama of the Yellow River unfolded.
sentences.cn: 我打开卷轴时, 黄河的景象展现在眼前。

sentences.en: As the mist cleared, a most beautiful view unfolded before their eyes.
sentences.cn: 薄雾散去, 美丽的景色逐渐呈现在他们的眼前。

sentences.en: The story unfolds as the film goes on.
sentences.cn: 情节随着影片的进展逐步展开。

sentences.en: When he came across his close friend, he unfolded his arms and hugged him.
sentences.cn: 当他遇到密友时, 张开双臂紧紧拥抱对方。

jushi.english: The story unfolds as the film goes on.
jushi.chinese: 情节随着影片的进展逐步展开。

jushi.english: As I opened the scroll, a panorama of the Yellow River unfolded.
jushi.chinese: 我打开卷轴时,黄河的景象展现在眼前。
